note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.
title: Economic complexity rank vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Economic complexity corresponds to ranking in the [Economic Complexity Index (ECI)](#dod:economic-complexity). Countries lower on the y-axis are considered more economically complex. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in the cost of living between countries.
sourceDesc: World Bank; Observatory of Economic Complexity (OEC) (2016); Atlas of Economic Complexity (2016)
